backend/src/services/indexer.py.description: IndexerService.search_notes() uses FTS5 with bm25() scoring + recency bonus. The note_tags table stores (user_id, note_path, tag) with indexes on user_tag and user_path. Tag filtering can be added via JOIN with GROUP BY/HAVING for AND logic.

backend/src/services/database.py.description: note_tags table has PRIMARY KEY (user_id, note_path, tag) and index idx_tags_user_tag for efficient tag lookups. Tags are normalized to lowercase before storage.
